# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(gb28181-server LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(gb28181-server "")
set_target_properties(gb28181-server PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "gb28181-server")
set_target_properties(gb28181-server PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/.")
target_include_directories(gb28181-server PRIVATE
    .
    /usr/local/include
)
target_compile_options(gb28181-server PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-O0>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-Wall>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-g2>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-ggdb>
)
set_target_properties(gb28181-server PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(gb28181-server PRIVATE cxx_std_11)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(gb28181-server PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(gb28181-server PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(gb28181-server PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(gb28181-server PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET gb28181-server PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(gb28181-server PRIVATE
    pthread
    osip2
    osipparser2
    eXosip2
)
target_link_directories(gb28181-server PRIVATE
    /usr/local/lib
)
target_link_options(gb28181-server PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(gb28181-server PRIVATE
    src/utils/json_helper.cpp
    src/utils/helper.cpp
    src/utils/singleton.cpp
    src/event_handler/register_handler.cpp
    src/main.cpp
    src/server.cpp
)
